alert.note: Alert for Erie; Ottawa; Sandusky (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 01 at 6:17PM EDT until July 01 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM EDT FOR OTTAWA...ERIE AND NORTHEASTERN SANDUSKY COUNTIES... At 616 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Oak Harbor to near Port Clinton to near Northern Milan, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported branches and power lines down in Fremont. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Sandusky, Fremont, Port Clinton, Kelleys Island, Put-In-Bay, Clyde, Oak Harbor, Northern Milan, Castalia, Catawba Island, Marblehead, Bay View, Bloomingville, Sandusky South, Fairview Lanes, Whites Landing, Vickery and Stony Prairie. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
